title: Mini-Ep 214: Spirituality With Grace
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 214: Spirituality With Grace
itunes:subtitle: Kate can’t stop eating prunes and listening to Dolly Parton and Doree decides sometimes self-care IS about a bath. Then, listeners send in their thoughts on spirituality, self-care practices they used to hate that they love now, and being a late-bloome...
description:
Kate can’t stop eating prunes and listening to Dolly Parton and Doree decides sometimes self-care IS about a bath. Then, listeners send in their thoughts on spirituality, self-care practices they used to hate that they love now, and being a late-bloomer. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
  • Worth the Wait Event
